name: Unl-ink
description:
CORONAVIRUS HAS SPREAD ALL OVER THE PLACE

YET, THERE’S STILL SOME PEOPLE WANDERING AROUND
LIKE NOTHING HAPPENED. SOMETIMES, THEY STILL
MAKE CONTACT TO EACH OTHER WITHOUT KNOWING IF 
OTHER PEOPLE HAS BEEN INFECTED YET.

WE MUST BREAK THE LINK OF CONTACT TO
PREVENT THIS VIRUS TO SPREAD RAPIDLY.

"IT’S YOUR JOB TO UNL-INK"

This game was made for the #AYOBIKINGAMEDIRUMAH Game Jam hosted by Clevio Coder Camp, Indonesia Ministry  of Communication and Informatics, and Asosiasi Game Indonesia.

You can support this game by liking the post about this game on my Instagram to vote for the Game Jam

instagram.com/melvintungadi

-Thanks For Playing-
